faq.question: What happens when my East Longmeadow solar system produces excess energy?
faq.answer: Massachusetts offers excellent net metering policies. When your East Longmeadow solar panels produce more electricity than you consume, the excess flows to the grid and you receive full retail rate credits on your Eversource bill. These credits roll forward month-to-month, allowing summer overproduction to offset winter usage.
